main event: Multiple sightings of round, luminous objects reported in Clovis, New Mexico, between September 30, 1960, and October 31, 1960.
interesting points: The object was described as round and luminous, descending slowly and illuminating as it went down,The sightings occurred over a clear day, which aided visibility,No specific direction of descent was reported, leaving conclusions about the object's nature uncertain,The object was compared in size to a rising sun, suggesting considerable size,At least twelve military observers were noted at Cannon AFB during the sightings.
witness description: military personnel on duty at Cannon AFB
